Title: Relates to defining members of the same family or household for purposes of family offenses
Summary: Relates to defining members of the same family or household for purposes of family offenses; includes persons who: are related to a child in common or to a person in an intimate relationship; and are currently living together in a family-type relationship or formerly lived together in a family-type relationship.
LawCode: Amd ยง459-a, Soc Serv L; amd ยง530.11, CP L; amd ยง812, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to defining members of the same family or household for purposes of family offenses
